item.description:
At Kumo, we discussed where to meet next, and we decided it would be great to go back to Akasaka again. This is one of Chris M's (The Middle of CT Sushi Meetup Group's founder) favorite places, and they have wonderful innovative rolls*. A few days later, Audrey let me know that the very first meeting of the Middle of Ct Sushi Meetup Group took place at Akasaka in December of 2007. What a fitting location for a 2nd anniversary Celebration! In addition, Chris and Cat just became new parents, and that is something to celebrate as well. I have asked Chris and Cat to join us of they can, and Chris says they will try their best. Come help us start year 3 out with a wonderful evening!

Here is a link to the menu:
http://www.allmenus.c...[url=http://www.allmenus.com/ct/new-haven/257098-akasaka/menu/][/url]

*Check out these rolls, taken from the menu link above...
-----------
Passion Roll
inside: spicy tuna, avocado, crunch and kayiware outside: yeloowtail, scallion and tobiko with black pepper & garlic sauce (8 pcs)
$12.95

Fantastic Tuna Roll
inside: tuna & charred tuna, avocado, strawberry, crunch and mint leaf outside: white tuna and black tobiko with wasabi fruity sauce (8 pcs)
$12.95

Lobster Super Roll
inside: fresh salmon, mango, crunch, caviar, outside: lobster salad and black tobiko with sweet mango sauce (8 pcs)
-------------------

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Happy Anniversary Sushi at Akasaka
